= Introduction =

RTPProxyBridge is a simple half duplex relay service. It may be used for simple bridging of different streams to the caller.It pre-allocates connections on ivworx start-up.




== `:new(...)` ==
_ctor_
creates CnxInfoBridge object

|| *named parameter* || *description* ||
|| ip || resolved ip address ||
|| port || port ||
|| cnx  || initiated from other connection ||

{{{

--
-- creates invalid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx1 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new())

--
-- creates valid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx2 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new{ip="192.168.100.5", port=6000})


--
-- creates valid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx3 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new{cnx=cnx1})

}}}

== `:ip()` ==
_property_

ip address

== `:port()` ==
_property_

port

== `:address()` ==
_property_

address in "ip:port" form
